title: (Weds Full) Veteran Anthony Thompson And Why We’re Building A Home for a Hero + The Cops Were Called to Someone’s House During the Show + Bobby’s Pitches a TV Show for Lunchbox
itunes:title: (Weds Full) Veteran Anthony Thompson And Why We’re Building A Home for a Hero + The Cops Were Called to Someone’s House During the Show + Bobby’s Pitches a TV Show for Lunchbox
description:
We talk to Anthony Thompson and his wife who with your help we want to build a home for a hero! His wife tells us the story of his injury that has left him without the ability to speak. We get the full story about why the cops showed up to someone on the show’s house and the frantic story. Because of a Tell Me Something Good, Bobby comes up with an idea for a TV show where Lunchbox goes back to school.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
